descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Stephen A. Smith says that for the Cavaliers, Kevin Love's injury is "devastating," but he sees the silver lining for Love, saying that the team as a whole is an "absolute drama" that he shouldn't want to be part of.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Analysis (Stephen A.: From Love's perspective, injury is 'heaven') 2018/01/30 ESHEET SC

videos.headline: Stephen A.: From Love's perspective, injury is 'heaven'
